snippet.title: Reindeer Story STEAM BETA + Trailer! - Paperverse 2024
snippet.description:
Have no fear, be a deer!

Reindeer Story is running a Beta on Steam!!
This is an opportunity to play Reindeer Story, provide feedback, AND be listed as a play tester in the credits!!! You can request a Steam Key from  @Azzie_S  through the Paperverse Discord server.

Wishlist Reindeer Story on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1946170/Reindeer_Story/ 
Paperverse Discord: discord.gg/paperverse

Reindeer Story is an RPG where you slip into the hooves of a reindeer! Run, jump and explore through 6 Chapters of Adventure! Face foes in turn-based battles with action commands, evade attacks in real-time and retaliate with Z-Skills! Can you stop Jack Frost's plan and return balance to winter?
